titleStmt.title: The butchers blessing, or The bloody intentions of Romish cavaliers against the city of London above other places, demonstrated by 5. arguments, to the Right Honourable the Lord Major, the sheriffes, and other the religious and worthy inhabitants of the said city. / Delivered by way of prologue before a sermon the last publique fast-day, by J: Goodwin.
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, John, 1594?-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
